newsitem.title: DENMARK: Danish May T-bill auction draws lower rates.
newsitem.headline: Danish May T-bill auction draws lower rates.

text.p: Denmark's central bank said on Thursday its monthly treasury bill auction resulted in minimum rates of 3.57 percent for the four month series and 3.67 percent for the eight month series.
One month ago, the four month series, at that time with a maturity of five months, yielded 3.64 percent, with the eight month series, then with nine months' maturity, yielding 3.75 percent.

The central bank said it sold 1.2 billion crowns worth of the four month series and 3.35 billion crowns worth of the eight month series, giving a total of 4.550 billion crowns. --Chris Follett, Copenhagen newsroom +45-33969652
